body.name: Baby Trend Ez-Lift 35 Plus Infant Car Seat, Liberty Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 34 mins
features: Built-in ergonomic Side Grip for an easy lifting technique recommended by chiropractors
Weighs less than 8 lb for easy carrying and lightweight mobility
Includes a cozy cover to keep baby warm and comfy during chilly times
Handle of the car seat can be used as an anti-rebound bar to limit rotation in the event of a collision
Base includes Flip Foot recline and bubble level indicator to help get the perfect angle
Plush seating for superior comfort for baby
Meets and exceeds federal safety standards
body.description: The Baby Trend EZ-Lift™ 35 PLUS Infant Car Seat (with Cozy Cover) provides parents with an easier way to LIFT and GRIP their infant car seat. Weighing at less than 8 lb, the EZ-Lift™ 35 PLUS allows parents to carry their infant car seat in a way that lessons the strain on their backs. This lifting technique has even be recommended by chiropractors as an ergonomically friendly method for carrying. The EZ-Lift™ also includes a multi-position base with level indicator as well as No-Twist Harness Indicator that allows parents to quickly see when the straps of the car seat are twisted. Safety-wise, the carrying handle of the EZ-Lift™ 35 PLUS acts as an anti-rebound bar when it is placed in forward position. Like all Baby Trend car seats, the EZ-Lift™ 35 PLUS Infant Car Seat meets and exceeds all federal safety standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat
reviews.reviewText: The quality and appearance is as it was shown online. It's lighter than most car seats. Its not that complicated, you can easily figure out how to work the car seat without the instructions. I chose this because it was affordable than most car seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: easy to install and works wonderful. My baby fits in it great and the straps were really easy to adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is perfect light weight exactly what I wanted only thing that would make it better is if it were pink lol but im a very happy pleased momma to be

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is definitely worth the money! It is super lightweight yet durable and doesn’t feel cheap. Installation was very simple and only took a few minutes. Definitely recommend if looking for something inexpensive yet good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything you want in a car seat!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough good things about this car seat. My son was in a different car seat and just looked smushed and hated it. He does so much better in this car seat. He’s got more space. The cushion and head support seem very comfy. The base was easy to install and the straps adjust easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, light car seat for low price.
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this has been a good car seat. We have used it in multiple vehicles and with the sit n stand 2.0 stroller. It is convenient and a good value for its price. There are just a couple of cons that prevented me from giving it a perfect rating. A complete list of pros and cons is listed below:Pros:-Car seat is lightweight compared to many. -it is very easy to connect to the base. It clicks right in.-It is very easy to take out of the base. There is a release on the back, and if you push this and pull up while also holding either the handle or bottom, it comes right out.-It has an insert for smaller babies to help hold their heads in place.-It comes with a belt to latch it to the new latches in cars but can also be used with normal seatbelt in older cars.-There is a level on the side of the base to help keep it leveled. (This only is convenient if you put it in the passenger side of the car. You can’t see it from the driver side door.)Cons:-baby trend says that their other products, such a as strollers, work with almost all of their car seats. However, this specific car seat is not compatible with many of the strollers, so make sure to look carefully if you’re buying them separately. From my experience, if you’re getting one of the sit n’ stand strollers, you have to make sure to get the 2.0 version.-We have had a difficult time getting the base to stay level in the car.-The belt that comes with it is hard to tighten.-To buckle the baby in, you have to put the two bottom pieces of the clip together before putting them into the latch; this is quite difficult to do quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Red Baby Car seat
reviews.reviewText: Amazing ! I love this car seat it’s amazing & I can’t tell its comfy lol but my son loves it and he seem like he sleeps so comfortable when he’s in it I love it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Newborn loves it
reviews.reviewText: My newborn loves being in this car seat. He doesn't fuss at all, and falls asleep really easily. It was really easy to install in the car and adjust the straps too.
